title: Roasted courgettes with chilli scrambled eggs

default: 5 tbsp dried porcini mushrooms, soaked in water until soft, drained and water reserved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the chilli scrambled eggs: 2 tbsp mushroom water, reserved from soaking the porcini

steps: Place the courgettes in a baking tray with the thyme, soaked mushrooms and olive oil and season well.
Roast in the oven for 15 minutes.
For the chilli scrambled eggs, melt the butter in a non-stick frying pan. Add the eggs, chilli, saffron and mushroom water and cook for two minutes.
Stir in the cream and season.
Serve the roasted courgettes alongside the chilli eggs.
